thread.title: He wasn't insane, he says -- he faked it to avoid prison
thread.title_full: He wasn't insane, he says -- he faked it to avoid prison

author: Therese Bottomly | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: He wasn't insane, he says -- he faked it to avoid prison
text: Available records establish that Montwheeler ran a medical con for 20 years, insisting to a string of state psychiatrists and psychologists that he was mentally ill.He did so to evade state prison, where he would be sent if he was convicted of kidnapping his first wife and son in Baker City in 1996.
